WorkItem.Description:
Every time I go to the rotation menu and then close it all of the values for items change even if I haven't changed the rotation at all. Repeatedly closing and opening it I can see things jump around in the list, even causing things such as a heroes item to be listed above a valorous of the same type and items providing negative dps.
 
3 Examples:
 
Valorous Darkruned Helmet         140.39   161.46   160.68
Valorous Scourgeborne Helmet    164.31   164.57   143.91
Heroes Scourgeborne Helmet      129.17   129.17   146.88
WorkItem.Summary: [DPSDK] Closing rotation details causes strange reactions

Comments.Message: If you're using 2.2.6, there's a strange threading bug which causes behavior like this.  The fix for this has been checked in and will be in 2.2.7.
2.2.6 is broken, all actions that cause rawr to recalculate anything will result in different numbers for DPSDK.
